_source.text: A few things to google and consider: A wedge (much better angle than blocks) or even tucker sling Cranial osteopathy A&e if your baby just won't stop crying to ask for the next level up of medication Keeping your baby upright all the time Not using a bumbo because of the pressure on their stomach Staying away from any waist bands Putting to sleep on stomach under docs guidance Thickening feed with carobel A sling Swaddling when feeding when in the middle of a flare up
